channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 12:12 Reduce the threat of artebors to Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Solve for further reports.
item.description: 游릭 12:12 Reduce the threat of artebors to Pokrovsk Territorial Community. Solve for further reports. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
